definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
wife of younger male cousin via male line
wife of younger male cousin via female line

sentences.english: Next to her lived their brother, Bill, and his wife Cleo.
sentences.chinese: 在這個旁邊住着她們的弟弟比爾和弟媳克里奧。

sentences.english: What relation would your father's sister's sister-in-law be to you?
sentences.chinese: 你和你父親的姐姐的弟媳是啥關係？

sentences.english: Her sister-in-law bought a basketful of apples.
sentences.chinese: 她的弟媳，買了一籃蘋果。

sentences.english: Later, Huang also mentioned knife will Hemeimei stem sister and sister-in-law fled after the killing.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，黃又提刀將何某某的乾姐及弟媳殺害後逃離。

sentences.english: THIAGO SILVA is very confident that Paulo Henrique Ganso wishes a summer move to Milan.
sentences.chinese: 弟媳很自信，炎天甘索希望加盟的是米蘭。

sentences.english: Patting her sister-in-law on her swollen belly, she said," I'll be back at the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 她拍拍弟媳隆起的肚子，說，“月底我還會來。

sentences.english: Milan's Thiago Silva is certain that Ganso wants to come to join him at Milanello.
sentences.chinese: 弟媳確定甘索會來米蘭內洛投奔他。

sentences.english: Then my sister-in-law asked the dreaded question.
sentences.chinese: 然後我弟媳開口問了那個可怕的問題。

sentences.english: Thiago Silva accepts he is the successor at AC Milan to club legend Paolo Maldini.
sentences.chinese: 弟媳接受了人們把他當做馬隊的接班人。

sentences.english: It is hard to believe that I now have a sister-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 很難相信現在自己有了個弟媳。

definition: wife of older male cousin via female line
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
husband of older female cousin via female line
